heading: Tuesday Night
text: Clearing early, except clouds decreasing slowly in the northern mountains, then clouds increasing all areas late. Lows from the mid 30s to around 40, except upper 20s to lower 30s northeast. Northwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph early, then diminishing.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered showers near and north of Route 2, becoming likely after noon and spreading south to around Route 4, chance farther south. Highs from the mid 40s to around 50 north, and upper 40s to mid 50s in the south. South to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Rain showers, mixing with or changing to snow north, with 1 to 3 inches in the hills, and a dusting possible at lower elevations outside the broad northern valleys. Lows in the upper 20s to mid 30s. West to northwest winds gusting to 45 mph near and north of Route 4, and to 55 mph south of Route 4.
